Count the number of fastq files in the f: Count the number of sequences in files/fastq/hcc1395_tumor_rep1_r1.fastq.gz
List all files in the folder names files with human-readable file sizes

find files/fastq -name *fastq.* | wc -l: zcat files/fastq/hcc1395_normal_rep1_r1.fastq.gz | awk '{if(NR%4==2) {count++; bases += length} } END{print bases/count}'
